heading: IPT Creative Ltd is qualified architectural technologist firm.
body: We offer independent thinking and creative design skills to maximise the value of projects. Working across a range of buildings types, we aim to deliver a practical and innovative design.
company_description: We offer independent thinking and practical design skills to maximise the value of projects. Working across a range of buildings types, we aim to deliver a practical and innovative design package aligned with the client brief and expectation.
